text:
If you haven’t figured it out yet, I’m posting one of these videos per day this week. I’m just excited about the release of this series!

If you’ve been reluctant to learn and build with the boilerplate.
<@U3T21PDBK> breaks it down in our CMS Hub for WordPress developers series.
<https://youtu.be/dpSjojGVVYc>
As an fyi, we have a dedicated channel for the <#CMXUWUY5D|hs-cms-boilerplate> if you have questions or want to contribute to it.
